main event: An observer sighted a craft resembling a broom with colored panels changing to olive green, over Virginia Beach on May 7, 1930.
interesting points: The object was first observed at 2200 hours traveling from west to east at about 3-400 ft high,It was sighted again at 2200 hrs at about 100 ft high,No other witnesses reported seeing the craft despite its long duration and low altitude,The observer did not take photographs or call others' attention to the object,The conclusion indicated it was a 'Possible AIRCRAFT'.
witness description: The observer is a civilian without specific identifying information.
